item.description:
For our September meeting, very special guest Joe Buissink will present and host a Q&A just for Boston! You don’t want to miss this opportunity to get your questions answered and chat with Joe one-on-one.

Joe's photography is about capturing the moments, and the essence of the person in those moments. His work redefines wedding photography, and has been described as Fine Art by his most notable celebrity clients. Joe has become a world-renowned teacher in the photographic field. His teachings have taken him on an international platform from Japan and Australia to England, Scotland and Ireland, as well as in the United States. Joe has been profiled by Good Morning America, Entertainment Tonight, Extra, Lifetime Television’s Wedding of a Lifetime, and E!. His work is published regularly in InStyle Weddings, Grace Ormonde Wedding Style, and People Magazine.

When
Friday, September 18, 2009
7:00PM

Where
Lens Pro To Go Studio
152 Commonwealth Ave, Unit M-1
Concord, MA 01742
Map - http://tinyurl.com/le...

Info
This event is FREE and open to all we just ask that you RSVP!

Paul Friedman
Owner - LensProToGo
www.lensprotogo.com
toll free 877-578-4777

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Joe Buissink redefines wedding photography
